Taharish Automobile Services

Diagnostic Check

At Taharish, we understand that prevention is always better than cure, especially when it comes to your vehicle. By identifying problems early on, you can prevent further damage and ensure the safety of yourself and other road users. Our experienced technicians are trained to stop small problems from turning into big ones. Dashboard warning lights are an effective way of detecting faults in modern vehicles. We recommend that you never ignore any warning light, whether it is amber or red, as red signifies a serious fault that requires urgent attention. Our trained technicians use advanced car diagnostic test equipment to quickly identify and diagnose any issues. We can make sense of even the most complicated fault codes and provide you with advice on any necessary repairs. Our comprehensive diagnostic check is reasonably priced, and the peace of mind it provides is priceless.

Air Conditioning Repairs and Recharging

At Taharish, we offer air conditioning services, repairs, and recharge to keep your car cool and functioning properly. If your AC isn't working as it should, it is important to get it serviced or repaired. We recommend periodic AC service to ensure it's functioning correctly, and we can help you diagnose and repair any AC problems you may have. With our specialized training and equipment, we can diagnose the problem accurately and recommend the right repairs the first time. Don't hesitate to make an appointment with our technicians if your car's AC isn't working properly.

Brake System Repairs and Replacements

Regular vehicle servicing offers many benefits, such as improved handling, fuel efficiency, and a smoother ride while prolonging the lifespan of the car and reducing the risk of breakdowns. Taharish provides a free visual safety inspection for brakes and other issues every time a vehicle comes in for service. They service, repair, inspect, and supply various brake parts at competitive prices and only use OE-approved parts. Skilled technicians are trained to spot potential problems and repair brakes correctly using high-grade brake products. Taharish promises friendly, honest, and straightforward service and continually checks their prices against competitors. The service schedule for a car depends on the manufacturer, age, and condition.

Suspension and Steering System Repairs and Replacements

At Taharish, we offer expert repairs and replacements for all types of suspension and steering systems. Our skilled technicians diagnose and repair any issues with shocks, struts, power steering, and alignment. We use the latest techniques and equipment to ensure your vehicle is running smoothly and safely on the road. We only use high-quality parts and materials, and our competitive pricing ensures you get the best value for your money. Don't compromise your safety on the road, bring your vehicle to Taharish for expert repairs and replacements. Contact us today to experience our reliable and trustworthy service.

Exhaust system repairs and replacements

At Taharish, we know that a healthy exhaust system is crucial for your vehicle's performance, fuel efficiency, and environmental impact. That is why we offer comprehensive repairs and replacements for all types of exhaust systems. Our skilled technicians use the latest diagnostic equipment to identify any issues with your exhaust system and provide expert solutions. From mufflers and catalytic converters to pipes and gaskets, we only use high-quality parts and materials to ensure your vehicle is running smoothly and efficiently. At Taharish, we understand the importance of affordability and offer competitive pricing on all our services. Don't let a faulty exhaust system compromise your driving experience or the environment. Schedule an appointment today and experience the difference of our reliable and trustworthy service.

Body work and paint services

At Taharish, we understand that your vehicle's appearance is just as important as its performance. That is why we offer expert bodywork and paint services to help restore your vehicle to its original condition. Our skilled technicians are trained to handle all types of bodywork, from minor dents and scratches to major collision repairs. We use only the highest quality materials and equipment to ensure a flawless finish that will last for years to come. Whether you need a simple touch-up or a complete repaint, we have the expertise to get the job done right. Plus, our competitive pricing ensures that you're getting the best value for your money. Trust Taharish for all your bodywork and paint needs. Contact us today to schedule an appointment and experience our exceptional service.

Upholstery repairs and replacements

At Taharish, we understand that the interior of your vehicle is just as important as the exterior. That is why we offer expert upholstery repairs and replacements to ensure your car's seats, carpets, and interior surfaces look and feel like new. Our skilled technicians are trained to handle any upholstery issues, from tears and stains to complete replacements. We only use high-quality materials and products to ensure a long-lasting and attractive finish. Plus, our competitive pricing ensures you are getting the best value for your money. Don't let worn-out upholstery detract from the comfort and style of your vehicle. Bring your car to Taharish for expert upholstery repairs and replacements. Contact us today to schedule an appointment and experience the difference of our reliable and trustworthy service.

Key and ECU programming and replacements

At Taharish, we understand the inconvenience and stress that comes with lost or damaged keys or malfunctioning ECUs. That is why we offer expert programming and replacement services for all types of keys and ECUs. Our skilled technicians are trained to diagnose and repair any issues with your vehicle's key and ECU systems. We use the latest techniques and equipment to ensure a seamless replacement or programming process. Plus, our competitive pricing ensures you are getting the best value for your money. Don't let key and ECU problems disrupt your day. Bring your vehicle to Taharish for reliable and efficient service. Contact us today to schedule an appointment.

Automobile tracking system installations

At Taharish, we understand the importance of vehicle safety and security. That is why we offer expert installation services for automobile tracking systems. Our skilled technicians use the latest technology to install GPS tracking devices that allow you to monitor your vehicle's location in real-time. In addition, we offer anti-theft and remote start systems to give you peace of mind and added convenience. We provide customized solutions to fit your specific needs and preferences, and our competitive pricing ensures you're getting the best value for your money. Protect your vehicle and ensure its safety with automobile tracking system installations at Taharish. Contact us today to schedule an appointment.

Fleet maintenance services

At Taharish, we understand that keeping your fleet of vehicles in top condition is crucial to your business's success. That is why we offer expert fleet maintenance services to ensure your vehicles are always running smoothly and efficiently. Our skilled technicians are trained to provide preventative maintenance, inspections, and repairs for all types of fleet vehicles, including cars, trucks, and vans. We use the latest equipment and techniques to diagnose and repair any issues quickly, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity. With our competitive pricing and flexible scheduling, we make it easy for businesses of all sizes to keep their fleet in top condition. Contact us today to learn more about our fleet maintenance services.

Automobile consultancy services

At Taharish, we offer expert automobile consultancy services to help you make informed decisions about your vehicle. Our experienced consultants provide guidance on a range of topics, including vehicle purchases, maintenance plans, and upgrades. We take the time to understand your unique needs and preferences, and we provide customized solutions that fit your budget and lifestyle. Our goal is to ensure you have the information you need to make confident decisions about your vehicle. With our reliable and trustworthy advice, you can feel confident in your automobile choices. Contact us today to learn more about our automobile consultancy services.

Oil, Filter Change

At Taharish, we understand that the condition of your engine is closely linked to the quality of oil and filter used. That is why we only use premium engine oils sourced from one of the world's largest lubricant manufacturers. Our team of oil and filter experts is always ready to assist you in choosing the right oil for your vehicle, based on the number of kilometres you drive. Engine oil lubricates the moving parts of your vehicle and ensures smooth operation, while the filter helps to remove dirt and debris from your engine. Regular oil and filter changes are necessary, typically every 3,000 to 9,000 kilometres, to maintain engine health. We carry a range of oils in stock, and offer fast, affordable changes to get you back on the road quickly.

Tyres

The tyre tread, general condition, and pressure are crucial components of a vehicle as they affect its safety and handling on the road. Taharish emphasizes the importance of regular tyre checks to ensure they are in good condition, advising that the tread depth should be above 1.6mm across three-quarters of the tyre and around its circumference. We offer a variety of tyre options/brands to suit all budgets, considering various factors such as weather, road conditions, and vehicle type. Our team provides expert advice on proper tyre care, including correct inflation levels for safe and comfortable driving, improved fuel consumption, and reduced tyre wear.

Batteries

At Taharish, we understand that a car battery is the heart of your vehicle's electrical system. That's why we offer top-quality car batteries and battery-related services to ensure that your car is always running smoothly. Our experienced technicians can help you select the right battery for your vehicle and install it quickly and efficiently. We carry a wide range of batteries from leading brands and offer competitive pricing to suit your budget. In addition, we also offer battery testing and charging services to ensure your battery is in optimal condition. And if your battery needs to be replaced, we can safely dispose of your old battery in an environmentally friendly way. Trust Taharish for all your car battery needs. Contact us today to schedule an appointment and experience the difference of our reliable and trustworthy service.

Engine Repair, Replacement and Service

Having engine trouble can be frustrating and costly. It is important to bring your car to a trusted and qualified shop to get an accurate diagnosis. At Taharish, we take pride in being precision technicians who prioritize accuracy and reliability. Our experienced technicians ensure that engine repairs and replacements are done correctly the first time, avoiding return trips to the shop. We understand the importance of your vehicle and your safety, which is why we take our roles seriously. If you are concerned about your engine, give us a call to schedule an appointment and find out what is needed to get you back on the road safely.

Transmission Repair, Rebuilding, Replacement

An accurate diagnosis for automatic transmission problems is crucial to avoid unnecessary costs. Delaying repairs can escalate the problem and result in a huge bill. At Taharish Automobile Services Limited, we have expertly skilled technicians who can quickly diagnose your transmission troubles and provide options for repairs. If your transmission needs replacement, we will help you make an informed decision and install the new or rebuilt transmission properly. It is important to have skilled mechanics do the work to prevent errors and ensure long-lasting repairs. Our goal is to give you peace of mind with your vehicle and eliminate the need for multiple repairs.

Flywheel Resurfacing

At Taharish, we understand that the automatic transmission of your car is a complex system that requires proper maintenance to run smoothly. With numerous moving metal parts, it is crucial to keep them lubricated to minimize friction and prevent breakdown. Our expert technicians know the importance of transmission fluid and how it protects your car's transmission. As time goes by and miles accumulate, the fluid loses its protective properties, leading to the breakdown of parts and metal flakes throughout the fluid, causing increased friction and heat. That is why we recommend regular automatic transmission service to avoid expensive repairs or replacements. Trust Taharish for reliable and affordable transmission service to keep your car running smoothly.

Cooling System

Taharish understands the importance of maintaining your car's cooling system to avoid costly repairs. The system comprises the radiator, hoses, and coolant that flow through the engine and transmission to prevent overheating. An overheated engine can result in repairs that cost thousands of dollars. That's why the coolant/anti-freeze is crucial, as it minimizes friction between metal components to prevent overheating and serious damage. At Taharish, we recommend periodic inspections and maintenance to ensure the cooling system is functioning correctly. We also test the coolant's performance to optimize its protective properties. Additionally, we recommend flushing out old fluids and replacing them with new ones every 1.5 to 2 years. Don't delay, visit Taharish to protect your car and save money on costly repairs.

3D Wheel Alignment

At Taharish, we understand the importance of correct wheel alignment for optimal road holding and extended tyre life. In most cases, aligning the front two wheels is sufficient, but for vehicles with a multi-link or independent rear suspension, all four wheels need to be aligned. Incorrect wheel alignment can lead to a host of problems such as reduced tyre life, poor handling, and increased fuel consumption. We use advanced 3D wheel alignment technology to ensure precise and accurate alignment, allowing you to enjoy a smoother, safer, and more fuel-efficient ride. Whether your vehicle pulls to one side or you want to extend your tyre life, our expert technicians can provide the wheel alignment your vehicle needs.

Electrical Repairs

Modern vehicles rely heavily on complex electrical systems to operate. When something goes wrong with your car's electrical system, it can be challenging to diagnose and repair without the right expertise and equipment. At Taharish, we have skilled technicians who specialize in electrical repairs for all types of vehicles. Whether you're dealing with a dead battery, faulty wiring, malfunctioning sensors, or any other electrical issue, we have the knowledge and tools to get to the root of the problem and provide efficient and effective repairs. Trust Taharish for all your electrical repair needs and get your vehicle back on the road safely and reliably.

Towing Services

Vehicle breakdowns can happen at any time, and when they do, it's essential to have a reliable towing service to assist you. Taharish offers professional towing services to get your vehicle to our repair shop quickly and safely. Whether you're stranded on the side of the road or need to transport a non-operational vehicle, our towing team is here to help. We have the right equipment and experienced drivers to handle all types of vehicles and towing needs. Rest assured that your vehicle will be in good hands when you choose Taharish for towing services. Contact us whenever you need assistance, and we'll be there to help.
